system.sustained:
Can lift an unattended object of up to 5kg x Willpower Bonus weight. This object can be thrown up to 3m x Willpower Bonus metres, if trying to hit a target make a Willpower Test, with success causing the object to deal 1d10 I damage with +1 per 5kg object weighs.
For every 5 points above threshold, can lift an additional 5kg x Willpower Bonus.
